body:
Pretty bored, ask me stuff. 

Don't expect me to sugarcoat opinions. If you ask your opinion here you are agreeing to take it.

replies.body:
Heya Stim!I don't think I've ever scrimmed against you until a few days ago on Wahiz, good game!
Did you know that this day in the year of 1958 NASA was created?
Questions...

  1. Are you wearing socks right now?
  2. What is your favourite thing to spend money on?
  3. What do you use more often, the dictionary or thesaurus?
  4. Why?
  5. Worst injury you have had?
  6. What kind of music do you listen to?
  7. List someone and describe them in 5 words! :P
  8. What is your current impression of me?
Hope you're having a great summer and hope to scrim you more often! :D
Have a listen to this!

Take it easy, - Aura

replies.body:
It'a hilarious when you take a dump on people with this name. 

You're pretty cool, a piss-off (or as the English would say, a piss-take) like I am. Sometimes you don't know when to stop, regardless of whether you're fucking with someone or not and it puts you in shitty situations with people. 

I've used like two a year or more ago. Out of those two I liked Cringed client more because it was hilarious to screw around with. 

I honestly don't go on MP TS and I dislike both. 

Brownies.

replies.body: Chill, nice guy. Good player, but a bit quiet in scrims. My main issue with you as a player is that you rarely comm and a lot of communication is needed in 5v5 scrims (which we are forced to play a lot of the time).
replies.body_tagged: Chill, nice guy. Good player, but a bit quiet in scrims. My main issue with you as a player is that you rarely comm and a lot of communication is needed in 5v5 scrims (which we are forced to play a lot of the time).

replies.body: Believe it or not, I think you're pretty chill from when we talked in TS. I don't really want us to have a bad standing because you actually seem like someone I'd bother talking to more. To clear things up, I literally said to Lego over Skype PM that there was a possibility of you cheating, but I was on my phone so I couldn't confirm anything or say anything for certain. I later looked through the video later on my PC and it looked fine in terms of autoclicking. I never accused you. That is complete bullshit and Lego escalating things far past what they were. I'd be happy to pull up logs if you don't believe me. just add me on jackson.stim.

replies.body:
Nope. 
Food, because I'm a fatass.
Thesaurus.
Tbh I have enough words as is, just sometimes if I need a really niche word or if I want to find an MC name for someone, I go to the thesaurus. 
Cracking my skull open. 
Basically anything, mainly chill rap/hip-hop and rock/metal. 
I'll do Maddy/TNT 4 fun:  Banter, slow, fun, chatty, friend.
I used to have a pretty shit impression of you, but it's getting better. I haven't seen you do much particularly around me to make me think you've completely changed, so I remain neutral.

replies.body: I know we only talked for like a week but do you think I could improve on anything in scrims and such?
replies.body_tagged: I know we only talked for like a week but do you think I could improve on anything in scrims and such?

replies.body:
You used to kb modify pretty blatantly, but I can't really say you cheat now. I haven't really looked into you as you aren't particularly sketchy. You've always been alright with me in TS and you seem to have really good game sense and are a smart player. You're the same as most of Apollo IMO, chill and nice individually, but extremely arrogant and cancerous together (with exceptions of a few players like zero). 

TGC days were so bants and I loved it. I remember when Lego only used to TNT run on SSB and it gave me a chance to get into contact with the EU community on Avicus.

replies.body: I think you're a really nice guy and fun to speak to on TS. Can still be a bit immature, but I like you. Yeah you meme, but you aren't really cancer. You've improved miles as a player without, at least, using something really blatant (I automatically doubt everyone is legit given this community, so don't take it as an accusation) and that deserves some respect.

replies.body:
Hello SuperGiraffe66.

I don't believe you know, because neither do I.. xD
But I wish we can get to know more about each other in the future.
Anyways...to the questions!

1. What is your real name?
2. How old are you?
3. How tall are you?
4. Would you consider yourself to be more of a talkative person, or a shy person?
5. Do you have any opinions on me? If so, please mention them.
6. What are your opinions on South Korea and Greece?
7. What is your favorite food?
8. What is your favorite movie?
9. Who is your favorite Senior Moderator?
10. Please rate your PvP skills.

Ok...I am not going to grill you with more questions, but if you have another AMA, I will ask you more than 10 questions! xD
See you in game!
Bye!

replies.body:
1. Jackson, most people know it 
2. 16 
3. About 5'10 or 178cm 
4. Shy at first, very talkative once I get to know the person/people with me 
5. I don't really have much of an opinion on you, but you seem like a nice person. Just to a lot of people it seems that you're tryharding for a staff position and are peppy to the point where people get uneasy. I really haven't talked to you, though. 
6. I like Korean food and I kinda want to learn about the culture there. I have a few Korean friends, so yea. Greece is a pretty cool country with some sweet food. I think how well they've been doing getting themselves slowly out of the economical crisis they are in has been pleasantly surprising and should have more attention brought to it. 
7. I'm a foodie, so I really don't have much of a favourite food xd. 
8. Forrest Gump. 
9. Greg, the rest I feel are followers and it really isn't great for the server.
10. I think I'm pretty good given I have done pretty well against some very good players, but I am far, far from the best and definitely need a lot of work.

Meh, gives me something to do so idm.

replies.body: Opinions
replies.body_tagged: Opinions

replies.body:
Super chill and funny on TS. I really like playing with you and chatting with you. You're relaxed attitude also helps stop every person on our team playing from tilting as well, which is invaluable. You're quite a good player, but you need to improve at melee a bit.

Cyclops, BmB, Loo, Applez (if he was active), Cyclones, DaGoldBrick, wylt, Moro (insane strats and very good player). Some people I played with in DS were absolutely amazing players, but they didn't shine much due to inactivity.

Since I'm a newer player: 
Epsilpha, Cyclones, Loo, DaGoldBrick, Applez, wylt, Kyle, Moro (his strats literally could almost single-handedly get him on). The people on this roster are all really cool, have some good memes and can be serious when we want to win games
replies.body_tagged:
Super chill and funny on TS. I really like playing with you and chatting with you. You're relaxed attitude also helps stop every person on our team playing from tilting as well, which is invaluable. You're quite a good player, but you need to improve at melee a bit.

Cyclops, BmB, Loo, Applez (if he was active), Cyclones, DaGoldBrick, wylt, Moro (insane strats and very good player). Some people I played with in DS were absolutely amazing players, but they didn't shine much due to inactivity.

Since I'm a newer player: 
Epsilpha, Cyclones, Loo, DaGoldBrick, Applez, wylt, Kyle, Moro (his strats literally could almost single-handedly get him on). The people on this roster are all really cool, have some good memes and can be serious when we want to win games

reply_to.body:
1. Jackson, most people know it 
2. 16 
3. About 5'10 or 178cm 
4. Shy at first, very talkative once I get to know the person/people with me 
5. I don't really have much of an opinion on you, but you seem like a nice person. Just to a lot of people it seems that you're tryharding for a staff position and are peppy to the point where people get uneasy. I really haven't talked to you, though. 
6. I like Korean food and I kinda want to learn about the culture there. I have a few Korean friends, so yea. Greece is a pretty cool country with some sweet food. I think how well they've been doing getting themselves slowly out of the economical crisis they are in has been pleasantly surprising and should have more attention brought to it. 
7. I'm a foodie, so I really don't have much of a favourite food xd. 
8. Forrest Gump. 
9. Greg, the rest I feel are followers and it really isn't great for the server.
10. I think I'm pretty good given I have done pretty well against some very good players, but I am far, far from the best and definitely need a lot of work.

Meh, gives me something to do so idm.

replies.body: Why you are not mod anymore? (If the users can know)
replies.body_tagged: Why you are not mod anymore? (If the users can know)

replies.body:
I'll copy my post from slack: 

"Hey guys, same as vo, I'm retiring (only temporary), but not because of Michael. I was thinking of retiring for a while, and now I have. I don't feel like moderating and I feel like moderating has become a burden rather than an enjoyment.  Only things I were really sticking around for were perms and banning cheaters. I'm taking a break to reinstate interest. I like being staff, but I just don't want to bother with the bullshit that has been happening for a while in the staff team. I kinda want to wait and see how the staff team evolves and hopefully improves, then come back. Thanks for the opportunity to be staff, but at this point I feel more like a burden than an asset. Keep an open mind to Michael becoming senior, honestly I'm half-half on it. Congratz to all the recent additions to the mod team. When OCN players come around, we really need to step it up to get players and hook them. We can do this and if you ever need help with hack detection, I'll gladly help. My Skype is jackson.stim if you guys ever need anything. Peace and thank you all for making this an amazing roller coaster of a ride.'

I really hope you prove me wrong and the mentor team and clean up your act.

replies.body:
Tl;dr 
I kinda got tired of the bullshit of the staff team and the drama. I'm not really interested in pubs on the server atm and want to wait until the staff team changes a bit before I return.

Michael is one of those changes. I think was a good addition now since he won't have the same power as before. Peachy is his puppet tbh and since he was admin at the time, Michael kind of abused that to get his way in the staff team last go. 

In 1.8 specifically, when someone is autoclicking their swing pattern/sword animation changes. In 1.8 the animation for hitting nothing is the same as for hitting a player. In 1.7, your pattern changes when you start hitting a player. Basically if you autoclick, you sword swing pattern behaves and interacts like the 1.7 animation, with the animation even being very similar to 1.7's. People don't realize it, but it's actually really blatant when you autoclick in 1.8.
replies.body_tagged:
Tl;dr 
I kinda got tired of the bullshit of the staff team and the drama. I'm not really interested in pubs on the server atm and want to wait until the staff team changes a bit before I return.

Michael is one of those changes. I think was a good addition now since he won't have the same power as before. Peachy is his puppet tbh and since he was admin at the time, Michael kind of abused that to get his way in the staff team last go. 

In 1.8 specifically, when someone is autoclicking their swing pattern/sword animation changes. In 1.8 the animation for hitting nothing is the same as for hitting a player. In 1.7, your pattern changes when you start hitting a player. Basically if you autoclick, you sword swing pattern behaves and interacts like the 1.7 animation, with the animation even being very similar to 1.7's. People don't realize it, but it's actually really blatant when you autoclick in 1.8.
